homepage.title: Welcome to Starlight
homepage.description: Get started building your docs site with Starlight.
homepage.hero.tagline: Congrats on setting up a new Starlight project!
homepage.card.updateContent.title: Update content
homepage.card.updateContent.description: Edit `src/content/docs/index.mdx` to see this page change.
homepage.card.addContent.title: Add new content
homepage.card.addContent.description: Add Markdown or MDX files to `src/content/docs` to create new pages.
homepage.card.configureSite.title: Configure your site
homepage.card.configureSite.description: Edit your `sidebar` and other config in `astro.config.mjs`.
homepage.card.readDocs.title: Read the docs
